overview: From 2025-08-29 to 2025-08-30, elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: update MCP plugin to align with MCP specification 2025-06-18
topPRs.author: Dexploarer
topPRs.body:
This major update brings the ElizaOS MCP plugin up to par with the latest Model Context Protocol specification (August 2025), adding modern transport support, enhanced security, and new MCP features.

## ‚ú® Key Features Added

### üöÄ Modern Transport Layer
- Add support for StreamableHTTPClientTransport (modern HTTP transport)
- Use StreamableHTTPClientTransport for 'http' and 'streamable-http' types
- Maintain backward compatibility with legacy SSE transport
- Add deprecation warnings for 'sse' transport type

### üîí Enhanced Security
- Add comprehensive security warnings for MCP server connections
- Add security warnings for tool execution (arbitrary code execution)
- Add security warnings for resource access (data exposure)
- Update README with detailed security considerations section
- Add compliance notes referencing MCP Specification 2025-06-18

### üìù New MCP Features: Prompts Support
- Add GET_PROMPT action for retrieving and using prompt templates
- Add prompt fetching and processing in McpService
- Add Prompt type support throughout the codebase
- Add prompt validation and argument handling
- Update provider data to include prompts information

### üìö Improved Documentation
- Update README with modern transport type examples
- Add comprehensive security guidelines and best practices
- Update configuration examples to promote modern transports
- Add deprecation warnings for legacy configurations
- Document new Prompts feature with usage examples

### üîß Technical Improvements
- Update to latest MCP SDK version (1.12.1)
- Add proper TypeScript types for new features
- Improve error handling for prompt operations
- Add AbortSignal timeout support for modern transports
- Apply code formatting and style improvements

## üîß Breaking Changes
None - all changes maintain backward compatibility while encouraging migration to modern standards.

## üìã Migration Guide
Users are encouraged to update their transport configurations:
- Change 'sse' to 'streamable-http' or 'http' for better performance
- Review security warnings in logs for compliance
- Explore new Prompts feature for structured AI interactions

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

- New Features
  - Added Prompts support: discover, select, and use templated prompts from connected servers.
  - Introduced GET_PROMPT action for prompt-driven workflows.
  - Added modern HTTP streaming transport for MCP connections.

- Documentation
  - Updated README with Prompts in feature list.
  - Revised configuration to recommend modern transport, added timeouts, and introduced a legacy (not recommended) section.
  - Added a new multi-server example with a modern web server.

- Security
  - Significantly expanded security guidance with principles, warnings, best practices, and compliance notes.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
